name: Beloved's Allsorts Inc.
description: A tribute to bar builders Allsorts Inc. and their liquid namesake, a hodgepodge of beer, this agave-based cocktail from Beloved in Greenpoint, Brooklyn mixes mezcal, tequila, pear eau de vie, and Velvet Falernum for a lightly citric baked-fruit flavor. It's grassy, sweet, fruity, plus a little bit spicy and sour all at once.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce pear eau de vie such as Purkhart Pear Williams
3/4 ounce freshly squeezed lemon juice from 1 lemon
1/2 ounce John D. Taylor's Velvet Falernum

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add pear eau de vie, mezcal, tequila, lemon juice, Velvet Falernum, allspice dram, and orange bitters. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds.
Strain into rocks glass filled with ice.
